definitions.text: marked by simplicity; having a humble opinion of yourself
examples: too modest to wear his medals

definitions.text: not large but sufficient in size or amount
examples: helped in my own small way
a simple man with simple tastes

definitions.text: not offensive to sexual mores in conduct or appearance
low or inferior in station or quality
examples: a modest man of the people

definitions.text: humble in spirit or manner; suggesting retiring mildness or even cowed submissiveness

examples: a newspaper with a modest circulation
